header.title: I'm Raquel, a programmer
header.description: I am a junior programmer with experience in video game development, interested in backend and artificial intelligence applied to healthcare. I consider myself a responsible, adaptable person with an ability to work well in teams. I enjoy solving problems and achieving goals collaboratively.
